display_long_description: Lethal Fear is a fan-made Gorilla Tag spin-off that takes the familiar fast-paced, tag-based gameplay and twists it into a heart-racing horror experience. In this game, players must not only use their agility to avoid being tagged, but also contend with an eerie atmosphere filled with lurking dangers and creepy, unpredictable threats. The environment is dark, unsettling, and ever-changing, keeping players on edge throughout each round. Lethal Fear features a variety of unique game modes, such as survival challenges where players must outlast terrifying enemies, hide-and-seek scenarios with monstrous “hunters,” and escape missions where danger constantly lurks around every corner. With its mix of intense action, nerve-wracking suspense, and spine-chilling jump scares, Lethal Fear delivers a new level of excitement and fear that keeps players coming back for more.
